sources.title: Letting In The Sunshine
sources.description: A window cleaner bumps into an old flame, and the pair turn detective in an attempt to foil a gang of burglars.

sources.title: The Sunshine Makers (1935)
sources.description: Happy sunshine-bottling gnomes battle gloomy swamp-dwellers. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-sunshine-makers-1935/

metadata.Plot: Sponsored by Borden's Milk---Elsie the Borden Cow is missing but her trademark sunflower is present---this fable has the Sunshine Gnomes (happiness) doing battle with the Blue Devils of Melancholy ( sadness and misery). The gnomes bottle sunshine (milk) and spray it over the unhappy denizens, thereby converting them to Bluebirds of Happiness.
